Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils

Class LobbyInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils.LobbyInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LobbyInfo extends Object implements Serializable
A serializable version of the lobby. It contains all the useful information about a specific lobby, like it's name, how many players are connected at a specific time, its max size, whether it's full or not, whether the game handled by the lobby is played in expert mode or not and all the members connected to the lobby.
See Also:

    List<String>
    getLobbyMembers()
    Returns a list of the nicknames of the players which are connected to the lobby when the LobbyInfo object is created.

    Returns the lobby name (equals the lobby owner's name).

    Returns whether the lobby is full or not.
    boolean
    isLobbyExpert()
    Returns whether the game handled by the lobby is played in expert mode or not.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a formatted string to print out on the console the lobby information.
